replies.msg:
Most interesting part of Klopp press conference comes right at the end. Won’t completely rule out recalling Harry Wilson from his Derby loan in January.

Says same applies for Wilson. If any of the ‘offensive wingers’ get injured then Wilson may be needed. First proper indication that Klopp sees a future for Wilson in Liverpool’s first team. Interesting.
